alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 06 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill. In southeast Kentucky, Lee. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated scattered showers containing heavy rainfall still passing through the advisory area. Minor flooding in low lying areas will continue to be a threat through 7:30 PM. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Leighton, Evelyn, Alumbaugh, Shade, Drip Rock, Wagersville, Pinnacle and Estilco.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
